author: Mehreen Khan
title: Time for more eurozone QE? Five charts you need to see before the ECB could unleash more firepower to Europe
text: Economics Time for more eurozone QE? Five charts you need to see before the ECB could unleash more firepower on Europe Six months on from the start of its bond-buying blitz, the European Central Bank is poised to reaffirm its commitment to do 'whatever it takes' The ECB kicked off its unprecendented $1 trillion QE scheme in March
